children.tooltip: Specify the number of data bytes to be sent
children.label: Bytes

children.tooltip: Stop after sending (and receiving) count ECHO_RESPONSE packets
children.label: Count

children.tooltip: specify a timeout, in seconds, before ping exits regardless of how many packets have been received.
children.label: Timeout

children.tooltip: wait millisecond between sending each packet
children.label: Interval

children.labelTooltip: Login by password or private credential

children.tooltip: Identity keys are private keys that an SSH client uses to authenticate itself when logging into an SSH server. They are analogous to physical keys that can open one or more locks.
children.placeholderText:
Example:
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
Proc-Type: 4,ENCRYPTED
DEK-Info: AES-128-CBC,4D4F0697FCBA4A07E23F13321804D4E1

children.label: Password
